title: Request to add a new feature: lock the window size of mRemoteNG
author: kgggggb
body_snippet:
Request to add a new feature: lock the window size of mRemoteNG
Sometimes I always drag the window accidentally, and then I feel uncomfortable, and it takes time to adjust it.
In addition, I hope that another feature can be added: locking the window layout.

iterations.description: User requests the ability to lock the mRemoteNG window size. This can be implemented by adding a setting and controlling the main form's BorderStyle.

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: may plan to make it possible in version 1.8

notes:
AI triage (gemini): User requests the ability to lock the mRemoteNG window size. This can be implemented by adding a setting and controlling the main form's BorderStyle.
Approach: Add a 'LockWindowSize' setting to Properties.Settings, a checkbox to AppearancePage, and modify FrmMain to change its FormBorderStyle based on this setting, preventing user resizing.
